channel.title: Change color of a party hat
channel.description: hi i would like to make a party hat black and orange but i have no idea how to? help please.

item.title: Change color of a party hat
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Just open the sprite in pain, zoom in and change the colors, then replace the old sprite with your new one

if your sprites are in .dat
then download Tomâ€™s cache suite and extract the .dat
open with paint again change color save as .dat
and import the new one

Read full topic
item.source: Change color of a party hat
